alps.title: ALPS Book Store
alps.doc: ALPS profile for managing an online bookstore catalog and defining the user purchase flow. This profile provides semantic definitions for both RESTful APIs and UI.

descriptor.title: Identifier
descriptor.doc: Unique identifier for each resource. UUID or auto-generated integer.

descriptor.title: Title
descriptor.doc: Title of book or category name. String with a maximum of 200 characters.

descriptor.title: Author
descriptor.doc: Name of the book's author. For multiple authors, names are comma-separated.

descriptor.title: ISBN
descriptor.doc: International Standard Book Number. Formatted as ISBN-13 with hyphens.

descriptor.title: Price
descriptor.doc: Sales price of the book. Pre-tax amount in JPY currency.

descriptor.title: Category
descriptor.doc: Genre or category of the book. Books may belong to multiple categories.

descriptor.title: Quantity
descriptor.doc: Quantity of books in the cart. Integer value greater than or equal to 1.

descriptor.title: Total Amount
descriptor.doc: Total amount for an order or cart contents. Displayed with tax included.

descriptor.title: User Name
descriptor.doc: Name of the customer. First and last name separated by a space.

descriptor.title: Email Address
descriptor.doc: Customer's contact email address. Used for sending order confirmation emails.

descriptor.title: Shipping Address
descriptor.doc: Delivery address for products. Includes postal code, prefecture, city, street address, and building name.

descriptor.title: Payment Method
descriptor.doc: Method of payment for the order. Options include credit card, cash on delivery, bank transfer, etc.

descriptor.title: Search Query
descriptor.doc: Keywords or conditions used for book searches. Can search by title, author name, ISBN, etc.

descriptor.title: Home Screen
descriptor.doc: Starting point of the application. Displays site-wide navigation and promotional information.

descriptor.title: Book Catalog
descriptor.doc: Screen displaying all books. Provides category filtering, keyword search, and sorting functions. Default display is ordered by recent additions.

descriptor.title: Book
descriptor.doc: Screen displaying individual book information. Shows detailed information, reviews, and related books. Items can be added to cart from this screen.

descriptor.title: Category
descriptor.doc: Book genre classification. May have a hierarchical structure with parent and child categories.

descriptor.title: Shopping Cart
descriptor.doc: Cart containing books the user intends to purchase. Allows quantity changes, deletion, and total amount confirmation. Managed on a session basis.

descriptor.title: Checkout Screen
descriptor.doc: Purchase procedure screen. Input user information, delivery destination, and proceed to payment. Displays final confirmation before order is placed.

descriptor.title: Payment Screen
descriptor.doc: Screen for entering payment information, confirming the order, and displaying order completion details. Handles payment method selection, payment validation, order placement, and shows order number, total amount, and estimated delivery date upon completion. A confirmation email is sent automatically.

descriptor.title: Go to Home Screen
descriptor.doc: Navigate to the application's home screen. Accessible from any screen.

descriptor.title: Go to Catalog Screen
descriptor.doc: Navigate to the book catalog list screen. All books are displayed.

descriptor.title: Go to Cart Screen
descriptor.doc: Navigate to the screen displaying the contents of the current shopping cart.

descriptor.title: Go to Checkout Screen
descriptor.doc: Navigate to the screen to confirm cart contents and proceed with purchase. Cannot transition if cart is empty.

descriptor.title: Go to Payment Screen
descriptor.doc: Navigate to the payment screen to input payment information and complete the order.

descriptor.title: Get Book List
descriptor.doc: Retrieve list of all books in the catalog. Can specify pagination (default 20 items/page) and sort order (newest, price, popularity, etc.).

descriptor.title: Search Books
descriptor.doc: Search for books based on specified search query. Can search across multiple fields including title, author name, content description, ISBN, etc.

descriptor.title: Get Category List
descriptor.doc: Retrieve list of all available book categories. For hierarchical categories, parent-child relationships are also returned.

descriptor.title: Get Book Details
descriptor.doc: Retrieve detailed information for a specific book based on the specified book ID. Includes stock status and related book information.

descriptor.title: Add to Cart
descriptor.doc: Add the specified book to the shopping cart. If already in the cart, quantity is increased. Orders exceeding stock will result in an error.

descriptor.title: Get Cart Items List
descriptor.doc: Retrieve all products in the current shopping cart, including their quantities, subtotals, and total amount.

descriptor.title: Update Cart Item Quantity
descriptor.doc: Update the quantity of a specific product in the cart. Values less than or equal to 0 cannot be specified. Quantities exceeding stock will result in an error.

descriptor.title: Remove Item from Cart
descriptor.doc: Completely remove the specified item from the cart. If the item does not exist in the cart, no changes are made.

descriptor.title: Input User Information
descriptor.doc: Input customer's name and email address. Email address is validated using regular expressions.

descriptor.title: Input Shipping Information
descriptor.doc: Input product delivery address. Features automatic address input using postal code lookup.

descriptor.title: Input Payment Information
descriptor.doc: Select order payment method and input necessary payment information. When credit card is selected, card information is input and validated.

descriptor.title: Place Order
descriptor.doc: Confirm order based on user input information, process payment, and display order confirmation details on the payment screen. Payment processing is executed, inventory is secured, and a confirmation email is sent. This operation cannot be reversed.

descriptor.title: Display Order Details
descriptor.doc: Display detailed information for the confirmed order on the payment screen. Includes order number, list of purchased products, total amount, delivery destination, payment method, etc.
